column5: Can anyone recommend/suggest a free site/link that will let me watch a Euro 2012 soccer game via computer?  Thanks in advance......  Meely
Type the same thing into google and it's endless..
Thanks but all the ones I am seeing are some sort of subscription.\ Can anyone recommend any link/site they use?
Thanks Roy...... Exactly what I was lookin' fer!!  Meely
Who ya cheering for? Im going with France.

Your cheering for everybody to just have fun, Joey? Haha
I don't watch or follow soccer. If I want to see decent acting I'll hit Stratford.
